field.name: line_ids
field.eval: [ (0, 0, {'name': 'Payment to Azure', 'partner_id': ref('base.res_partner_12'), 'credit': 100.0, 'account_id': obj().env['account.journal'].search([('type', '=', 'bank'), ('company_id', '=', obj().env.company.id)], limit=1).default_account_id.id}), (0, 0, {'name': 'Payment to Azure', 'partner_id': ref('base.res_partner_12'), 'debit': 100.0, 'account_id': obj().env['account.journal'].search([('type', '=', 'bank'), ('company_id', '=', obj().env.company.id)], limit=1).suspense_account_id.id}), ]
